refnamediv.refpurpose: Compiles, Instantiates and runs a compiled Faust program.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in faustcsound. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Faustgen will invoke the just-in-time compiler, instantiate and run a Faust program.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Scode -- a string containing a Faust program.
ihandle -- a handle to the Faust DSP instance, which can be used to access its controls with faustctl.
